name: Traffic Jam (Ian Wang)
description:
“Do your darndest and you will get promoted in no time!”

Traffic Jam is a chaotic couch co-op crossing guard game. As a crossing guard, you will have to act fast to clear various obstacles that might clog up your crosswalk. Hastily manage your pedestrians before they take matters into their own hands.

Roles : 

 Ian - lead programmer 

 Julian - UI / Producer 

 Arshad - 3D Graphics 

 Zhengrui - Sound 

 Julianna - 2D Graphics 

 Daniel - Design
